text: public Task<byte[]> GetBoardInfoAsync(Board boardModel) { return Task.Run((Q) => { if (boardModel is null) return default; var queryResult = connection?.ExecuteQuery<object>(boardModel.ResultDBName, boardModel.GetBoardCondtionQuery()); if (queryResult != null && queryResult.Any()) { var result = queryResult[@] as dynamic; return result.CONDITIONDATA as byte[]; } return null; B; }
